descriptionHtml:
Hi guys, I decided to give you one last Enhanced Textures before I'm going away for a long pause or perhaps even for good.

I've always loved this armor and I think my Enhanced Textures make it shine.
I've no idea where this armor came from and I haven't asked around if it's ok to be uploaded on Nexus. I hope it is ok and that I'm not doing all this work for nothing.

As always, these are not re-textures, but only magic tricks I made on photoshop, hence the name Enhanced Textures. They are not even 4K actually, but all 2K. I wrote 4K because this armor handle textures in a different way than most of the others: there are 8 of them instead of the usual 4, so they are as detailed and heavy on the pc as if they were 4K textures.

About the images: I don't have a funcioning Skyrim right now (and that's why I'm taking a pause) so I can't make new images with the original textures. I had to use a very old and very ugly screenshot.

Enjoy it.

Original mod: [url=http://mitakusaner.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-991.html]Sky TM[/url]
UUNP version, not required but reccomended: [url=http://wtfuun.tumblr.com/post/145491234019/akabir-samurai-bikini-armor-uunp-hdt-need-this]Diablio Link[/url]

CREDITS:
Ofam for creating the original mod
author: Arjuna76
